metadata.name: Clear Linux Logs
metadata.comment: Detects attempts to clear logs on the system. Adversaries may clear system logs to hide evidence of an intrusion

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/rm')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/shred')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/unlink'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/var/log')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/var/spool/mail'))))

output.summary: Detects attempts to clear logs on the system. Adversaries may clear system logs to hide evidence of an intrusion

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate administration activities Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1070.002/T1070.002.md
